sentences.en: 20 heads of Dutch clover yielded 2,290 seeds.
sentences.cn: 白三叶草有20串花序,结2,290颗种子.

sentences.en: Beaver: Oh look, Henry! Your favorite! Nice juicy clover!
sentences.cn: 看啊, 亨利! 这是你最喜欢的! 鲜美多汁的苜宿!

sentences.en: Fatal concentration was Caucasian Clover 1.2 % , Red Clover 1.2 % , White Clover 0.9 %.
Forage collapses crops like clover and our alfalfa could be planted.
sentences.cn: 像苜蓿和紫花苜蓿粮草庄稼可以被种植.

sentences.en: Grass and clover seed should be sown at a depth of 12 - 20 mm.
sentences.cn: 禾木科草和三叶草播种深度应为 12-20 毫米.

sentences.en: Herds are fattening on the early clover.
sentences.cn: 家畜吃早春的苜蓿而上膘.

sentences.en: If that's so, then what of the three - leaf clover?
sentences.cn: 如果这样的话, 那三片叶子的三叶草会是什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: In many parts of the world clover is grown as food for cattle.
sentences.cn: 在世界许多地区,种植红花草用来作牲畜饲料.

sentences.en: It's comfortable here. We live in clover and get everything we want.
sentences.cn: 这里很舒适. 我们生活非常好,要什么有什么.

sentences.en: Miss Clover's cheeks were flaming, and a sudden indignation dispelled her habitual shyness.
sentences.cn: 格洛弗小姐的双颊红得象团火, 突然爆发的愤慨驱走了她惯有的懦怯.

sentences.en: Since winning the lottery, they've been living in clover.
sentences.cn: 中奖之后, 他们过着舒适优裕的生活.

sentences.en: The Club looks a little like a leaf clover design.
sentences.cn: 例句梅花看上去有点像三叶草的图案.

sentences.en: The farmers here grow wheat, oats and clover.
sentences.cn: 这里的农民种植小麦 、 燕麦和秣草.

sentences.en: The land is laid down with red or white clover.
sentences.cn: 这块土地种上了红花和白花苜蓿.

words.tran_cn: 四叶苜蓿形的立体交叉公路

phrases.tran_cn: 四叶苜蓿（等于four-leaved clover）；幸运草
生活优裕，生活奢华：过着安逸、舒适或幸运的奢侈生活

trans.tran_cn: 三叶草，<非正>生活舒适而富裕，养尊处优，生活优裕
trans.tran_en: a small plant, usually with three leaves on each stem. If you find one with four leaves, it is thought to bring you luck.
